duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct opening and closing operational routines, ensuring the successful start or completion of the store's daily business.
Execute detailed, comprehensive stock and product management routines, including processing shipment and completing markdowns, merchandising, replenishment and fulfilling online orders.
Welcome guests and assist with finding their perfect pair, accessories, or apparel.
Keep an overview of daily operations and troubleshoot any concerns with transactions and store routines.
